item.title: Context engineering case studies: Etsy-specific question answering
item.description: Exploring prompt engineering in AI-assisted onboarding at Etsy reveals both benefits and limitations. The study focused on how well LLMs provide reliable answers to Etsy-specific questions, particularly in the Travel & Entertainment domain. Initial findings indicate that concise prompts improve answer accuracy. However, some instances showcased LLM “hallucinations,” emphasizing the need for careful prompt design.
